name: King, you lost your Crown... as usual
name_original: King, you lost your Crown... as usual
description:
You play for the king who often loses his crown. Without the crown, he is not a king. You will be allowed into the castle only TOGETHER  with the crown. To get to it you have to work with a SHOVEL. Dig the earth and fall asleep water. Put your way to the kingdom.

- you need to get Crown and come to the Castle with it

- use for walking "WASD" keys, use for Reload Level "R" key

- click on the Ground to DIG  it

- click on Water to Put Ground

- you can't move when you hold Ground

- you can't DIG Ground if you are the King

- you can TAKE OFF the Crown and get the shovel by Click on Ground around you
